# SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.repeat

**Case**

The animation loops after displaying all of its images.

## Declaration

```swift
case `repeat`
```

## Constants

- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.clamp**: The animation stops after displaying all of its images.
- **SCNParticleImageSequenceAnimationMode.autoReverse**: After the animation displays all of its images, it plays again in reverse order.
